long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clientell Leadpro lets you connect your CRM to LinkedIn through a browser extension. Create and enrich contacts, find qualified emails, and synchronize Notes and Tasks related to the Contacts or associated Opportunities to your CRM directly in your LinkedIn environment. Connect to the Clientell Decision Landscape and automate manual tasks impeding your Revenue Growth.
